list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update user data change functionality
This commit updates the code responsible for changing user data in the dashboard. The form now allows users to modify their information and submit the changes by clicking the "Zmień" button.
The code verifies the uniqueness of the username and email address to ensure that only one user can have the same values. If a duplicate is found, an appropriate error message is displayed.
Additionally, the code now includes a validation check for the password length. If the provided password is not between 8 and 20 characters, an error message is shown.
These changes enhance the security and functionality of the user data modification feature.
Modified files: - dashboard.php

task.summary: Create connection.php and dashboard.php. Refactor logowanie.
Zrobiłem kodzik tak aby współpracował z tabelą użytkownicy. Działa rejstracja oraz logowanie. dashboard.php wyświetla póki co nazwę użytkownika.
